channel.title: +Dubious bAbaisms on hindu-vichArAH हिन्दु-विचाराः
channel.description: Recent content in +Dubious bAbaisms on hindu-vichArAH हिन्दु-विचाराः

item.title: Error catalog
item.description: nityAnanda/ nithyAnanda Bad examples for followers: Numerous sex scandals, dancing on father’s corpse. entrapment of whistle-blowers Hilariously wrong claims “abhinavagupta inspired shankarAchArya” “sun delayed his rising for me.” sadhguru jaggi vAsudev Wrong claims about science, scientists and scientific facts. NM12 Sanskrit etymology mistakes Confusing: ‘kala’ (‘kāla’, “time” or “dark”), ‘kali’ (‘kālī’, the goddess), and ‘khali’ (khālī/ख़ाली/خالي, “empty”) - NM, YT.

item.title: Misc fuckirs
item.description: nAtha-sampradAya " Of the 13 Nath sub-orders, I understand the Rawal or Nagnath order of Punjab consisted of Muslims though it traced its ancestry to Shiva. One book says that the 1891 census listed about 17% of the wandering Yogis as Muslims! The collection of verses named Gorakhbani attributed to Gorakhnath (13th or 14th century) has several verses praising the glory of the Prophet Mohammed.” “I understand that in 2005 a book was published under the authority of the Yogī Mahāsabhā.

item.title: Sikhism
item.description: Intro sikhism has latent abrahamist tendencies. In a way, it is proto-islamophile-secularism. Same with many baba-isms. The holy texts: [list here] Gurdas Vaar (not part of the grantha) supposedly relates the mecca visit tale too. hard core khAlistanis who don’t even accept dahsam granth. Anti-hindu patterns Many sardaars show traits typical of secularists - on the surface turned their backs on mosaic religion, while retaining the same disdain for heathens and their practices.
